item.title: CSS regex/ attribute selectors
item.description: Learning Bootstrap, sass/scss. (Large) Author: self Some of my works Github Contact through Email Introduction Css supports regex when styling elements, it uses simple regex match syntax using *, ^, $, ~ to match complete, start, end and contains matches. Things I have learnt. css regex match start match (^); end match ($); contains match (~); complete/followed match (*); Brief explanation Regex in CSS Regex is also available in css. cool right!
